gui.common
Class Controller

java.lang.Object
  gui.common.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
IController
Direct Known Subclasses:
AddItemBatchController, AddProductController, AddProductGroupController, AddStorageUnitController, EditItemController, EditProductController, EditProductGroupController, EditStorageUnitController, ExpiredReportController, InventoryController, MainController, NoticesReportController, ProductStatsReportController, RemovedReportController, RemoveItemBatchController, SupplyReportController, TransferItemBatchController
public abstract class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements IController

Controller is a base class that provides common functionality required by all controllers in the program (i.e., all controller classes extend Controller).

The functionality provided by Controller to its subclasses includes:

  • A reference to the controller's view object
  • An abstract method interface that must be supported by all subclasses
  • A template method that defines a standard algorithm for constructing subclass instances

Subclasses should override the following methods:

  • enableComponents
  • loadValues

Subclasses should also call construct from their constructors.

Method Summary
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
